Name: Paisley Spritz
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: The sweet honeyed spice notes of Scottish liqueur combine harmoniously with the gentle acidity of the wine, lengthened and freshened with ginger ale.
History: Created in October 2013 by Simon Difford at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Our Spritz page contains information on the history of, and other recipes for, the Spritz family of cocktails.
Nutrition: One serving of Paisley Spritz contains 139 calories
